SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

physics3d
Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--physics3d.Geometry
public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object

In physics3d, the timeUntil* methods are not well-definied for the case where a ball is intersecting an object. Please don't do this. Unlike 6.170 physics, physics3d has the weaker spec that it is allowed to return negative collision times instead of Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY. This may be changed in the future depending on time constraints. Unlike 6.170 physics, physics3d defaults to maximumForesight = 0.1

public static javax.media.j3d.Transform3D reflectBallFromSphere(Sphere ball,
                                                                Sphere sph,
                                                                javax.media.j3d.Transform3D ballVelocity,
                                                                double sphCOR)
Computes the new velocity of a ball after bouncing (reflecting) off of a Sphere.

Parameters:
ball - the Sphere representing the ball
sph - the Sphere which is being hit by the ball
Returns:
the velocity of the ball after impacting the given Sphere

reflectBalls

public static Trans3DPair reflectBalls(Sphere ball1,
                                       double mass1,
                                       javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans1,
                                       Sphere ball2,
                                       double mass2,
                                       javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans2)
Computes the resulting velocities of two balls which collide, assuming a perfectly elastic collision.

Parameters:
ball1 - the Sphere representing the first ball
mass1 - the mass of the first ball
trans1 - the Transform of the first ball before impact
ball2 - the Sphere representing the second ball
mass2 - the mass of the second ball
trans2 - the Transform of the second ball before impact
Returns:
a Trans3DPair, where the first Transform3D is the velocity of the first ball after the collision and the second Transform3D is the velocity of the second ball after the collision.

reflectBallFromRotatingSphere

public static javax.media.j3d.Transform3D reflectBallFromRotatingSphere(Sphere ball,
                                                                        javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans,
                                                                        Sphere sph,
                                                                        Cylinder axisOfRotation,
                                                                        double angularVelocity,
                                                                        double sphCOR)
Computes the new velocity of a ball reflected off of a rotating Sphere.

Parameters:
ball - the Sphere representing the size and position of the ball before impact
trans - the Transform3D of the ball before impact
sph - the rotating Sphere
axisOfRotation - the axis about which sph is rotating
angularVelocity - the angular velocity with which sph is rotating about axisOfRotation, in radians per second. A positive angular velocity denotes a CCW rotation, looking at axisOfRotation with p2 in front of p1.
sphCOR - the COR of the sphere
Returns:
the Transform3D of the ball after impacting the rotating Sphere

reflectBallFromRotatingSphere

public static javax.media.j3d.Transform3D reflectBallFromRotatingSphere(Sphere ball,

                                                                        double angularVelocity)

sph - the rotating Sphere
axisOfRotation - the axis about which sph is rotating

reflectBallFromRotatingCylinder

public static javax.media.j3d.Transform3D reflectBallFromRotatingCylinder(Sphere ball,
                                                                          javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans,
                                                                          Cylinder cyl,
                                                                          Cylinder axisOfRotation,
                                                                          double angularVelocity,
                                                                          double cylCOR)
Computes the new velocity of a ball reflecting off of a cylinder which is rotating about a point with constant angular velocity.

Parameters:
ball - the Sphere representing the size and position of the ball before impact
trans - the Transform3D of the ball before impact
cyl - the rotating Cylinder
axisOfRotation - the point about which cyl rotates
angularVelocity - the angular velocity with which sph is rotating about axisOfRotation, in radians per second. A positive angular velocity denotes a CCW rotation, looking at axisOfRotation with p2 in front of p1.
cylCOR - the reflection coefficient of the cylinder
Returns:
the velocity of the ball after impacting the Cylinder

Computes the new velocity of a ball reflecting off of a plane segment which is rotating about a point with constant angular velocity.

Parameters:
ball - the Sphere representing the size and position of the ball before impact
trans - the Transform3D of the ball before impact
ps - the rotating PlaneSegment
axisOfRotation - the point about which ps rotates
angularVelocity - the angular velocity with which ps is rotating about axisOfRotation, in radians per second. A positive angular velocity denotes a CCW rotation, looking at axisOfRotation with p2 in front of p1.
psCOR - the reflection coefficient of the PlaneSegment
Returns:
the velocity of the ball after impacting the PlaneSegment

timeUntilBallSphereCollision

public static double timeUntilBallSphereCollision(Sphere ball,
                                                  Sphere sph,
                                                  javax.media.j3d.Transform3D velocity)
Computes the time until a ball represented by a Sphere, travelling at a specified velocity collides with a specified (non-moving) Sphere.

Parameters:
ball - a Sphere representing the size and initial location of the ball
velocity - the velocity of the ball before impact
Returns:
the time until collision or POSITIVE_INFINITY if the collision will not occur
See Also:
Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY

timeUntilCollision

public static double timeUntilCollision(Sphere ball,
                                        Sphere gizmo,
                                        javax.media.j3d.Transform3D velocity)

timeUntilBallCylinderCollision

public static double timeUntilBallCylinderCollision(Sphere ball,
                                                    Cylinder cyl,
                                                    javax.media.j3d.Transform3D velocity)
Computes the time until a ball, represented by a Sphere, travelling at a specified velocity collides with a specified Cylinder's rounded perimiter. Note endcaps and edges are *not* checked.

Parameters:
cyl - the Cylinder representing an edge that might be collided with.
ball - a Sphere indicate the size and location of a ball which might collide with the given line segment
velocity - the velocity of the ball before impact
Returns:
the time until collision, or POSITIVE_INFINITY if the collision will not occur
See Also:
Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY, endpoint effects

public static double timeUntilCollision(Sphere ball,
                                        Cylinder cyl,
                                        javax.media.j3d.Transform3D velocity)

timeUntilBallPlaneCollision

public static double timeUntilBallPlaneCollision(Sphere ball,
                                                 PlaneSegment pseg,
                                                 javax.media.j3d.Transform3D velocity)
Computes the time until a ball represented by a Sphere, travelling at a specified velocity collides with a specified (non-moving) plane segment.

Parameters:
pseg - a PlaneSegment representing the triangle with which the ball may collide
ball - a Sphere representing the size and initial location of the ball
velocity - the velocity of the ball before impact
Returns:
the time until collision or POSITIVE_INFINITY if the collision will not occur
See Also:
Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY

timeUntilBallBallCollision

public static double timeUntilBallBallCollision(Sphere ball1,
                                                javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans1,
                                                Sphere ball2,
                                                javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans2)
Computes the time until two balls collide.

Parameters:
ball1 - a Sphere representing the size and initial position of the first ball.
trans1 - the Transform3D of the first ball before impact
ball2 - a Sphere representing the size and initial position of the second ball.
trans2 - the Transform3D of the second ball before impact
Returns:
the time until collision or POSITIVE_INFINITY if the collision will not occur
See Also:
Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY

rotateTransformAboutLine

public static javax.media.j3d.Transform3D rotateTransformAboutLine(javax.media.j3d.Transform3D point,
                                                                   Cylinder axisOfRotation,
                                                                   double radsToRotate)
Rotates the point represented by point by radsToRotate around the center of rotation, axisOfRotation, and returns the result.

Parameters:
point - the initial location of the point to be rotated
axisOfRotation - a Cylinder representing indicating the axis of rotation; radius is ignored. Positive rotation is right-handed (ie looking at axisOfRotation head-on, with p2 closer to you, positive is CCW)
radsToRotate - the amount (in radians) by which to rotate point
Returns:
point point rotated around axisOfRotation by radsToRotate

public static javax.vecmath.Vector3d rotatePointAboutLine(javax.vecmath.Vector3d point,
                                                          Cylinder axisOfRotation,

Parameters:
point - the initial location of the point to be rotated
axisOfRotation - a Cylinder representing indicating the axis of rotation; radius is ignored. Positive rotation is right-handed (ie looking at axisOfRotation head-on, with p2 closer to you, positive is CCW)
radsToRotate - the amount (in radians) by which to rotate point
Returns:
point point rotated around axisOfRotation by radsToRotate

timeUntilBallRotatingSphereCollision

public static double timeUntilBallRotatingSphereCollision(Sphere ball,
                                                          javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans,
                                                          Sphere sph,
                                                          Cylinder axisOfRotation,
                                                          double radsPerSec)
Computes the time until a ball travelling at a specified velocity collides with a rotating Sphere.

Parameters:
ball - a Sphere representing the size and initial position of the ball
trans - the Transform3D of the ball before impact
sph - a Sphere representing the initial location and size of the rotating sphere
axisOfRotation - the axis around which the Sphere is rotating
radsPerSec - the angular velocity with which sph is rotating about axisOfRotation, in radians per second. A positive angular velocity denotes a rotation in the CCW direction with p2 of axisOfRotation being in front of p1.
Returns:
the time until collision or POSITIVE_INFINITY if no collision was detected.
See Also:
Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY

timeUntilBallRotatingCylinderCollision

public static double timeUntilBallRotatingCylinderCollision(Sphere ball,
                                                            javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans,
                                                            Cylinder cyl,
                                                            Cylinder axisOfRotation,
                                                            double radsPerSec)
Computes the time until a ball travelling at a specified velocity collides with a rotating cylinder.

Parameters:
ball - a Sphere representing the size and initial location of the ball
trans - the initial Transform3D of the ball before impact. The ball is assumed to travel at a constant velocity until impact.
cyl - the initial position of the rotating cylinder
axisOfRotation - the axis of rotation for cyl
radsPerSec - the angular velocity of the rotation of cyl in radians per second. A positive angular velocity denotes a rotation in the CCW direction with p2 of axisOfRotation being in front of p1.
Returns:
the time until collision or POSITIVE_INFINITY if no collision was detected.
See Also:
Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY, endpoint effects

timeUntilBallRotatingPlaneSegmentCollision

public static double timeUntilBallRotatingPlaneSegmentCollision(Sphere ball,
                                                                javax.media.j3d.Transform3D trans,
                                                                PlaneSegment ps,
                                                                Cylinder axisOfRotation,
                                                                double radsPerSec)
Computes the time until a ball travelling at a specified velocity collides with a rotating PlaneSegment.

Parameters:
ps - the initial position of the rotating PlaneSegment
axisOfRotation - the axis of rotation for ps
radsPerSec - the angular velocity of the rotation of ps in radians per second. A positive angular velocity denotes a rotation in the CCW direction with p2 of axisOfRotation being in front of p1.
ball - a Sphere representing the size and initial location of the ball
trans - the initial Transform3D of the ball before impact. The ball is assumed to travel at a constant velocity until impact.
Returns:
the time until collision or POSITIVE_INFINITY if no collision was detected.
See Also:
Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY, endpoint effects
